verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is the <S%G5287>substance<s%> of <S%G4229>things<s%> <S%G1679>hoped<s%> for, the <S%G1650>evidence<s%> of things not <S%G991>seen.<s%>
For by it the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G3140>obtained<s%> a good <S%G3140>report.<s%>

Through <S%G4102>faith<s%> we <S%G3539>understand<s%> that the <S%G165>worlds<s%> were <S%G2675>framed<s%> by the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1519>so<s%> that things <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G991>seen<s%> were not <S%G1096>made<s%> of things which do <S%G5316>appear.<s%>

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G6>Abel<s%> <S%G4374>offered<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> a more <S%G4119>excellent<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G2535>Cain,<s%> by <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G3140>obtained<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> that he was <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3140>testifying<s%> of his <S%G1435>gifts:<s%> and by it he being <S%G599>dead<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G2980>speaks.<s%>

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1802>Enoch<s%> was <S%G3346>translated<s%> that he should not <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G2288>death;<s%> and was not <S%G2147>found,<s%> <S%G1360>because<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> had <S%G3346>translated<s%> him: for <S%G4253>before<s%> his <S%G3331>translation<s%> he had this <S%G3140>testimony,<s%> that he <S%G2100>pleased<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> it is <S%G102>impossible<s%> to <S%G2100>please<s%> him: for he that <S%G4334>comes<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> that he is, and that he is a <S%G3406>rewarder<s%> of them that <S%G1567>diligently<s%> <S%G1567>seek<s%> him.

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3575>Noah,<s%> being <S%G5537>warned<s%> of God of things not <S%G991>seen<s%> as <S%G3369>yet,<s%> <S%G2125>moved<s%> with <S%G2125>fear,<s%> <S%G2680>prepared<s%> an <S%G2787>ark<s%> to the <S%G4991>saving<s%> of his <S%G3624>house;<s%> by the <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G2632>condemned<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G2818>heir<s%> of the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> which is by <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> when he was <S%G2564>called<s%> to <S%G1831>go<s%> out <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G3195>after<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> for an <S%G2817>inheritance,<s%> <S%G5219>obeyed;<s%> and he <S%G1831>went<s%> out, not <S%G1987>knowing<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> he <S%G2064>went.<s%>

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> he <S%G3939>sojourned<s%> in the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G1860>promise,<s%> as in a <S%G245>strange<s%> country, <S%G2730>dwelling<s%> in <S%G4633>tabernacles<s%> with <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> and <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> the <S%G4789>heirs<s%> with him of the same <S%G1860>promise:<s%>
For he <S%G1551>looked<s%> for a <S%G4172>city<s%> which <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G2310>foundations,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5079>builder<s%> and <S%G1217>maker<s%> is <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Through <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4564>Sara<s%> <S%G846>herself<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G1411>strength<s%> to <S%G2602>conceive<s%> <S%G4690>seed,<s%> and was <S%G5088>delivered<s%> of a <S%G5088>child<s%> when she was <S%G3844>past<s%> <S%G2244>age,<s%> <S%G1893>because<s%> she <S%G2233>judged<s%> him <S%G4103>faithful<s%> who had <S%G1861>promised.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G1080>sprang<s%> there <S%G2532>even<s%> of <S%G1520>one,<s%> and him as good as <S%G3499>dead,<s%> so many as the <S%G798>stars<s%> of the <S%G3772>sky<s%> in <S%G4128>multitude,<s%> and as the <S%G285>sand<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is by the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G5491>shore<s%> <S%G382>innumerable.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> in <S%G4102>faith,<s%> not having <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G1860>promises,<s%> but having <S%G1492>seen<s%> them <S%G4207>afar<s%> off, and were <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> of them, and <S%G782>embraced<s%> them, and <S%G3670>confessed<s%> that they were <S%G3581>strangers<s%> and <S%G3927>pilgrims<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>
For they that <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> things <S%G1718>declare<s%> <S%G1718>plainly<s%> that they <S%G1934>seek<s%> a <S%G3968>country.<s%>

And <S%G3303>truly,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> they had been <S%G3421>mindful<s%> of that country from <S%G3739>where<s%> they <S%G1831>came<s%> out, they might <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2540>opportunity<s%> to have <S%G344>returned.<s%>

But <S%G3570>now<s%> they <S%G3713>desire<s%> a <S%G2909>better<s%> country, that is, an <S%G2032>heavenly:<s%> <S%G1352>why<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is not <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> to be <S%G1941>called<s%> their <S%G2316>God:<s%> for he has <S%G2090>prepared<s%> for them a <S%G4172>city.<s%>

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> when he was <S%G3985>tried,<s%> <S%G4374>offered<s%> up <S%G2464>Isaac:<s%> and he that had <S%G324>received<s%> the <S%G1860>promises<s%> <S%G4374>offered<s%> up his <S%G3439>only<s%> <S%G3439>begotten<s%> son,
Of <S%G3739>whom<s%> it was <S%G2980>said,<s%> That in <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> shall your <S%G4690>seed<s%> be <S%G2564>called:<s%>

<S%G3049>Accounting<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G1415>able<s%> to <S%G1453>raise<s%> him up, <S%G2532>even<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead;<s%> from <S%G3606>where<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G2865>received<s%> him in a <S%G3850>figure.<s%>
By <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> and <S%G2269>Esau<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> things to <S%G3195>come.<s%>

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> when he was a <S%G599>dying,<s%> <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G1538>both<s%> the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2501>Joseph;<s%> and <S%G4352>worshipped,<s%> leaning on the <S%G206>top<s%> of his <S%G4464>staff.<s%>

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> when he <S%G5053>died,<s%> <S%G3421>made<s%> <S%G3421>mention<s%> of the <S%G1841>departing<s%> of the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel;<s%> and gave <S%G1781>commandment<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> his <S%G3747>bones.<s%>

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> when he was <S%G1080>born,<s%> was <S%G2928>hid<s%> <S%G5150>three<s%> <S%G5150>months<s%> of his <S%G3962>parents,<s%> <S%G1360>because<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> he was a <S%G791>proper<s%> <S%G3813>child;<s%> and they were not <S%G5399>afraid<s%> of the <S%G935>king's<s%> <S%G1297>commandment.<s%>

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> when he was <S%G1096>come<s%> to <S%G1096>years,<s%> <S%G3173><s%> <S%G720>refused<s%> to be <S%G3004>called<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G5328>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%G2364>daughter;<s%>

<S%G138>Choosing<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> to <S%G4778>suffer<s%> <S%G4778>affliction<s%> with the <S%G2992>people<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> to <S%G2192>enjoy<s%> <S%G619><s%> the <S%G2237>pleasures<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> for a <S%G4340>season;<s%>

<S%G2233>Esteeming<s%> the <S%G3680>reproach<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3187>greater<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> than the <S%G2344>treasures<s%> in <S%G125>Egypt:<s%> for he had <S%G578>respect<s%> to the <S%G3405>recompense<s%> of the <S%G3405>reward.<s%>

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> he <S%G2641>forsook<s%> <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> not <S%G5399>fearing<s%> the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of the <S%G935>king:<s%> for he <S%G2594>endured,<s%> as <S%G3708>seeing<s%> him who is <S%G517>invisible.<s%>

Through <S%G4102>faith<s%> he <S%G4160>kept<s%> the <S%G3957>passover,<s%> and the <S%G4378>sprinkling<s%> of <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> he that <S%G3645>destroyed<s%> the <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> should <S%G2345>touch<s%> them.

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> they <S%G1224>passed<s%> <S%G1224>through<s%> the <S%G2281>Red<s%> <S%G2281>sea<s%> as by <S%G3584>dry<s%> land: <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G124>Egyptians<s%> <S%G3984>assaying<s%> <S%G2983><s%> to do were <S%G2666>drowned.<s%>
By <S%G4102>faith<s%> the <S%G5038>walls<s%> of <S%G2410>Jericho<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> down, after they were <S%G2944>compassed<s%> <S%G2944>about<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> the <S%G4204>harlot<s%> <S%G4460>Rahab<s%> <S%G4881>perished<s%> not with them that <S%G544>believed<s%> not, when she had <S%G1209>received<s%> the <S%G2685>spies<s%> with <S%G1515>peace.<s%>

And <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G3004>say?<s%> for the <S%G5550>time<s%> would <S%G1952>fail<s%> me to <S%G1334>tell<s%> of <S%G1066>Gedeon,<s%> and of <S%G913>Barak,<s%> and of <S%G4546>Samson,<s%> and of <S%G2422>Jephthae;<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G5037>also,<s%> and <S%G4545>Samuel,<s%> and of the <S%G4396>prophets:<s%>

<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2610>subdued<s%> <S%G932>kingdoms,<s%> <S%G2038>worked<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G2013>obtained<s%> <S%G1860>promises,<s%> <S%G5420>stopped<s%> the <S%G4750>mouths<s%> of <S%G3023>lions.<s%>

<S%G4570>Quenched<s%> the <S%G1411>violence<s%> of <S%G4442>fire,<s%> <S%G5343>escaped<s%> the <S%G4750>edge<s%> of the <S%G3162>sword,<s%> out of <S%G769>weakness<s%> were <S%G1743>made<s%> <S%G1743>strong,<s%> <S%G1096>waxed<s%> <S%G2478>valiant<s%> in <S%G4171>fight,<s%> <S%G2827>turned<s%> to <S%G5437>flight<s%> the <S%G3925>armies<s%> of the <S%G245>aliens.<s%>

<S%G1135>Women<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> their <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G386>raised<s%> to life <S%G386>again:<s%> and <S%G243>others<s%> were <S%G5178>tortured,<s%> not <S%G4327>accepting<s%> <S%G629>deliverance;<s%> that they might <S%G5177>obtain<s%> a <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G386>resurrection:<s%>

And <S%G2087>others<s%> <S%G2983>had<s%> <S%G3984>trial<s%> of cruel <S%G1701>mockings<s%> and <S%G3148>scourgings,<s%> <S%G1161>yes,<s%> <S%G1161>moreover<s%> of <S%G1199>bonds<s%> and <S%G5438>imprisonment:<s%>

They were <S%G3034>stoned,<s%> they were <S%G4249>sawn<s%> <S%G4249>asunder,<s%> were <S%G3985>tempted,<s%> were <S%G1722>slain<s%> with the <S%G3162>sword:<s%> they <S%G4022>wandered<s%> <S%G4022>about<s%> in <S%G3374>sheepskins<s%> and <S%G122>goatskins;<s%> <S%G1192><s%> being <S%G5302>destitute,<s%> <S%G2346>afflicted,<s%> <S%G2558>tormented;<s%>

(Of <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> was not <S%G514>worthy:<s%>) they <S%G4105>wandered<s%> in <S%G2047>deserts,<s%> and in <S%G3735>mountains,<s%> and in <S%G4693>dens<s%> and <S%G3692>caves<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>
And <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> having <S%G3140>obtained<s%> a good <S%G3140>report<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2865>received<s%> not the <S%G1860>promise:<s%>
<S%G2316>God<s%> having <S%G4265>provided<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> thing for us, that they <S%G5565>without<s%> us should not be <S%G5048>made<s%> <S%G5048>perfect.<s%>
